properties.Description: A billing instruction used during invoice generation.

amount.Description: The amount budgeted for this billing instruction.

startDate.Description: The date this billing instruction goes into effect.

endDate.Description: The date this billing instruction is no longer in effect.

creationDate.Description: The date this billing instruction was created.

displayName.Description: The name of the billing profile.

poNumber.Description: The purchase order name that will appear on the invoices generated for the billing profile.

invoiceEmailOptIn.Description: Flag controlling whether the invoices for the billing profile are sent through email.

enabledAzurePlans.Description: Enabled azure plans for the billing profile.

properties.Description: The properties of the billing profile.

displayName.Description: The name of the billing profile.

poNumber.Description: The purchase order name that will appear on the invoices generated for the billing profile.

billingRelationshipType.Description: Identifies which services and purchases are paid by a billing profile.

invoiceEmailOptIn.Description: Flag controlling whether the invoices for the billing profile are sent through email.

invoiceDay.Description: The day of the month when the invoice for the billing profile is generated.

currency.Description: The currency in which the charges for the billing profile are billed.

enabledAzurePlans.Description: Information about the enabled azure plans.

indirectRelationshipInfo.Description: Identifies the billing profile that is linked to another billing profile in indirect purchase motion.

invoiceSections.Description: The invoice sections associated to the billing profile.

status.Description: The status of the billing profile.

statusReasonCode.Description: Reason for the specified billing profile status.

targetClouds.Description: Identifies the cloud environments that are associated with a billing profile. This is a system managed optional field and gets updated as the billing profile gets associated with accounts in various clouds.

billingAccountName.Description: The billing account name of the partner or the customer for an indirect motion.

billingProfileName.Description: The billing profile name of the partner or the customer for an indirect motion.

displayName.Description: The display name of the partner or customer for an indirect motion.

properties.Description: The properties of an invoice section.

displayName.Description: The name of the invoice section.

state.Description: Identifies the state of an invoice section.

targetCloud.Description: Identifies the cloud environments that are associated with an invoice section. This is a system managed optional field and gets updated as the invoice section gets associated with accounts in various clouds.

displayName.Description: The name of the invoice section.

properties.Description: The properties of an invoice section.

marketplacePurchases.Description: The policy that controls whether Azure marketplace purchases are allowed for a billing profile.

reservationPurchases.Description: The policy that controls whether Azure reservation purchases are allowed for a billing profile.

viewCharges.Description: The policy that controls whether users with Azure RBAC access to a subscription can view its charges.

properties.Description: The properties of a customer's policy.

viewCharges.Description: The policy that controls whether the users in customer's organization can view charges at pay-as-you-go prices.

properties.Description: The properties of the role assignment.

createdOn.Description: The date the role assignment was created.

createdByPrincipalTenantId.Description: The tenant Id of the user who created the role assignment.

createdByPrincipalId.Description: The principal Id of the user who created the role assignment.

createdByUserEmailAddress.Description: The email address of the user who created the role assignment. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

name.Description: The name of the role assignment.

principalId.Description: The principal id of the user to whom the role was assigned.

principalTenantId.Description: The principal tenant id of the user to whom the role was assigned.

roleDefinitionId.Description: The ID of the role definition.

scope.Description: The scope at which the role was assigned.

userEmailAddress.Description: The email address of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

userAuthenticationType.Description: The authentication type of the user, whether Organization or MSA, of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

properties.Description: The properties of the role assignment.
The properties of the role assignment.

value.Description: The list of invoice section properties with create subscription permission.

nextLink.Description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

invoiceSectionId.Description: The ID of the invoice section.

invoiceSectionDisplayName.Description: The name of the invoice section.

billingProfileId.Description: The ID of the billing profile for the invoice section.

billingProfileDisplayName.Description: The name of the billing profile for the invoice section.

billingProfileStatus.Description: The status of the billing profile.

billingProfileStatusReasonCode.Description: Reason for the specified billing profile status.

enabledAzurePlans.Description: Enabled azure plans for the associated billing profile.

expiryTime.Description: The time in UTC when the download URL will expire.

url.Description: The URL to the PDF file.

properties.Description: Properties of the transfer billing subscription operation result.

isTransferEligible.Description: Specifies whether the subscription is eligible to be transferred.

code.Description: Error code for the product transfer validation.

details.Description: Detailed error message explaining the error.

displayName.Description: The display name of the product.

purchaseDate.Description: The date when the product was purchased.

productTypeId.Description: The ID of the type of product.

productType.Description: The description of the type of product.

status.Description: The current status of the product.

endDate.Description: The date when the product will be renewed or canceled.

billingFrequency.Description: The frequency at which the product will be billed.

lastChargeDate.Description: The date of the last charge.

quantity.Description: The quantity purchased for the product.

skuId.Description: The sku ID of the product.

skuDescription.Description: The sku description of the product.

tenantId.Description: The id of the tenant in which the product is used.

invoiceSectionId.Description: The ID of the invoice section to which the product is billed.

invoiceSectionDisplayName.Description: The name of the invoice section to which the product is billed.

billingProfileId.Description: The ID of the billing profile to which the product is billed.

billingProfileDisplayName.Description: The name of the billing profile to which the product is billed.

customerId.Description: The ID of the customer for whom the product was purchased. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

customerDisplayName.Description: The name of the customer for whom the product was purchased. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

currency.Description: The currency for the amount value.

resellerId.Description: The MPN ID of the reseller.

isTransferEligible.Description: Specifies whether the transfer is eligible or not.

code.Description: Error code for the product transfer validation.

details.Description: Detailed error message explaining the error.

autoRenew.Description: The flag that determines the auto-renew settings for a product.

properties.Description: Summary of update auto renew operation properties

endDate.Description: The date at which the product will be canceled.

recipientEmailId.Description: The email ID of the recipient to whom the transfer request is sent.

resellerId.Description: Optional MPN ID of the reseller for transfer requests that are sent from a Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

creationTime.Description: The time at which the transfer request was created.

expirationTime.Description: The time at which the transfer request expires.

invoiceSectionId.Description: The ID of the invoice section to which the product is billed after the transfer request is completed.

billingAccountId.Description: The ID of the billing account to which the product is billed after the transfer request is completed.

resellerId.Description: Optional MPN ID of the reseller for transfer requests that are sent from a Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

resellerName.Description: Optional name of the reseller for transfer requests that are sent from Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

initiatorCustomerType.Description: The type of customer who sent the transfer request.

billingProfileId.Description: The ID of the billing profile to which the product will be billed after the transfer.

recipientEmailId.Description: The email ID of the user to whom the transfer request was sent.

initiatorEmailId.Description: The email ID of the user who sent the transfer request.

canceledBy.Description: The email ID of the user who canceled the transfer request.

lastModifiedTime.Description: The time at which the transfer request was last modified.

productType.Description: Type of product that is transferred.

productId.Description: The ID of the product that is transferred.

productId.Description: The ID of the product that is transferred.

creationTime.Description: The time at which the transfer request was created.

expirationTime.Description: The time at which the transfer request expires.

allowedProductType.Description: Type of subscriptions that can be transferred.

recipientEmailId.Description: The email ID of the user to whom the transfer request was sent.

initiatorEmailId.Description: The email ID of the user who sent the transfer request.

resellerId.Description: Optional MPN ID of the reseller for transfer requests that are sent from a Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

resellerName.Description: Optional name of the reseller for transfer requests that are sent from Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

initiatorCustomerType.Description: The type of customer who sent the transfer request.

canceledBy.Description: The email ID of the user who canceled the transfer request.

lastModifiedTime.Description: The time at which the transfer request was last modified.
